*Wrath converts to his beast mode and follows Inzola*
  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, July =
24, 2000 5:53 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Deemos didn't know these=
 spots well neither, but he wasn't going to say anything to Wrath about it.=
 Inzola transformed to Termite mode and led the way...
    ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Se=
nt: Sunday, July 23, 2000 11:16 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Wr=
ath: I'm sure we could find a good one. *Wrath begins walking trough the ju=
ngle looking around* Wrath: Maybe you should lead. I don't know these spots=
 too well.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 11:06 PM
      Sub=
ject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Inzola nods to Wrath and waits for Wrath t=
o lead the way. Deemos looked at Wrath.

      "You know, I used to hunt an=
imals, but I had so many animal heads on my wall, I started hunting robots.=
 Caught my fair share of Maximals and Predacons, I did! But the ones here a=
re extra powerful, good challenge!" Deemos said to Wrath...
        ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 10:50 PM
        Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


        Wrath: Hmm...Sound good to me! *Wrath says to In=
zola*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
    =
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 9:05 PM=

          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          Deemos just stares at hi=
m.

          "Wrath, we could go and find someone to slag." Inzola said...=

            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizard=
s 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, July 22,=
 2000 4:44 PM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            Wrath: =
I don't really know......Damn... I never plan ahead! Hmm...I haven't been a=
ound for to long...Hmm... *Wrath continues thinking of something to do*
   =
           ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
     =
         To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, July 22, 200=
0 5:19 AM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              Deemos =
and Inzola walk to the jungle with Wrath.

              "Who are we huntin=
g?" Deemos asked...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
       From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
     =
           Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:08 AM
                Subject: R=
e: Neo Beast Wars


                *Wrath begins walking for the jungle*
 =
                 ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: THEC=
ODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Satu=
rday, July 22, 2000 5:02 AM
                  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

=

                  "Yes, let's go." Inzola said to Wrath...
               =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: ilovealllizard=
s 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Sa=
turday, July 22, 2000 4:53 AM
                    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wa=
rs


                    Wrath: We could try jungle? *Wrath asks Deemos*
  =
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                      Fro=
m: THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                 =
     Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:39 AM
                      Subject: R=
e: Neo Beast Wars


                      "It's up to you where we start." =
Deemos said to Wrath...
                        ----- Original Message ----=
- 
                        From: ilovealllizards 
                        T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 200=
0 4:27 AM
                        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


           =
             *Wrath nods and smiles* Wrath: Where should start? *Wrath asks=
 Inzola and Deemos*
                          ----- Original Message ----- =

                          From: THECODE 
                          To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:=
50 AM
                          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


             =
             "Hunting? We hunted down almost everyone already, but sure, we=
'll come." Inzola said.

                          "Good to practice with o=
ur new beast modes." Deemos said. He patted Wrath on the shoulder.

       =
                   "Those Alliance and Preds will be sorry they wouldn't le=
t us join!" Deemos said. Inzola looked at Wrath.

                         =
 "The Maximals, most of them just don't got it, but a few stand out, you ar=
e one of those few." Inzola said to Wrath...
                            --=
--- Original Message ----- 
                            From: ilovealllizar=
ds 
                            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                   =
         Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
                            =
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                            *Wrath smiles* Wr=
ath: Well......We can go scouting...hmm....I've haven't had much to do...We=
 go hunting? *Wrath asks Deemos and Inzola*
                              -=
---- Original Message ----- 
                              From: THECODE 
 =
                             To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      =
        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
                             =
 Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                              Inzola smiles =
and shakes Wrath's hand.

                              "Nice to meet such =
a charming and powerful bot upon my repair." Inzola said. Deemos and Inzola=
 hugged for about 5 seconds and then looked back to Wrath.

               =
               "So, what are we supposed to do right now?" Deemos asked Wra=
th...
                                ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
                         From: ilovealllizards 
                           =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: Saturday=
, July 22, 2000 12:53 AM
                                Subject: Re: Neo B=
east Wars


                                Wrath: I am Wrath and you must =
be the Inzola that Deemos spoke about. A pleasure to meet you. *Wrath exten=
ds his hand for a hand shake*
                                ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
                                From: THECODE 
           =
                     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                              =
  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:20 AM
                                Su=
bject: Neo Beast Wars


                                Deemos looked at th=
e CR Chamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

          =
                      "Maximal base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said.=
 Deemos laughed.

                                "Who are you?" Inzola ask=
ed Wrath.

                                Gangon's spark is still waiting.=


                                Artist runs around in a circle, playing h=
is stupid games he believed exercises him. He runs away from the Maximal ba=
se and to a mountain. He runs into the mountain and an avalanche starts, Ar=
tist is burried, various thoughts pass through his mind. Hours later, he aw=
akes.

                                "Oh, that was some blow, but I'll go=
 with the flow." Artist said.

                                "Plintissa? =
Where are you my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He rem=
embered that she was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were working,=
 so he ran to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

              =
                  "Plintissa dear? You don't remember me? For me death was =
near." Artist said. Plintissa looked up in shock and flew into Artist's arm=
s. Artist laughed and they kissed. After the kiss.

                       =
         "Do me a favor, Artist, stop using rhymes." Plintissa said. She ki=
ssed him.

                                "Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll have=
 a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They both laughed and Artist took Plintis=
sa to a grassy plain.

                                Dracona held up her =
scanning device in front of Scorponok's face.

                            =
    "I can find that device I lost." Dracona said.

                       =
         "Then I'll give it to the Predacons, it's a piece of my blaster, i=
t is an ice gun." Dracona said. She looked at Scorponok with big beautiful =
eyes. Sinister and Sinesis stared at her, mouths agape.

                  =
              The Radicons sat there still...
